trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
There were no other sightings in Sparks on or around March 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAwoke at 6:30am.Walked into the bathroom.As I was standing there I always look out the window as it faces off to the west.I seen this egg shape diamond like thing off in the distance that caught my eye.At first I thought it was just a plane on aproach to reno international.As that is a landing path route.This was further out as I looked around.As I watched it,I noticed it was spinning and moving up,down,side to side.But was stationary to that area.At this point I used my thumb as a referance to the size of it.As I was holding my thumb up to size it,it was at this point I seen somthing like a bright white dot shoot out of it and off to the west.I made mental note,at that point again about 10seconds later another dot shot out to the south.I wanted to get a better view of this so I went back to my bedroom window to locate the object but it was gone.I only seen a plane on aproach from the south.This siting lasted about 5min 10 sec.
Summary: Egg shape diamond reflective spinning shooting out a white dot every 10 sec in different directions
